content: Yes, and even so, there is a solely human position to be occupied here: aesthetic appreciation. Consider the reaction of Fan Hui: “So beautiful” (documented here: https://www.wired.com/2016/03/sadness-beauty-watching-googles-ai-play-go/ ). Too many of us would discount beauty as “merely” aesthetic, but I think there’s an argument to be made for it as a place where humans make a uniquely human contribution.
